channel.title: MachosRealm -2 Servers-
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/s6jf2s.png[/img][/CENTER]
FORUMS: [url=http://www.machosrealm.com]MachosRealm[/url]
Welcome to MachosRealm. We currently have 2 servers. A 317 server and a 718 server. The 317 is older graphics while the 718 has the newer graphics. We did this to allow players how they like to see their items.
Both servers offer an amazing experience. Our development team updates the servers as needed so unique content is added every week. Our forums, [url=http://www.machosrealm.com]MachosRealm[/url] is well liked by our players. Chat on here and give and gain information that you need to have a great time on Machosrealm. Our staff team is mature, educated, and online all the time to give help to anyone that needs it. Our top of the line VPS gives us 100% NO LAG with both of our servers for hard development. Some of our player's computers may experience some issues at first but once you adjust your settings, you are good to go.
Have fun and thanks for checking out Machosrealm
317: -Unique source, has not been released anywhere. -Many bosses to gain powerful items! -We have dungeoneering with points -We have 100% fullscreen! -We have an amazing skilling system. -We offer many minigames for our players to enjoy. -Much more! Login to find out what we have to offer!
718: -Unreal graphics. You'll be blown away! -Fullscreen for amazing view of our server. -Many bosses to fight alongside your friends! -Dungeoneering for those insane weapons! -Construction to make cash!\ -Custom home that has never been seen before! -Amazing content for an enjoyable experience. -Terrific skilling for all those lvl3 skillers -The newest items to show off to your buddies!
[CENTER][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2vjskn6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/29l0oxg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/bea32u.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/15ppxrb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/fod5yt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/b4gjk2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ng4zf4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/29z4do3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/awoqit.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/30jqvkg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2i296j7.png[/img][/CENTER]
Thank you for taking the time to look at our server. We offer an enjoyable experience for any age. We take care of our players and go to the fullest extent to make them happy. We try our hardest to learn more in the programming world to increase the success of our server. We are constantly trying to get better and we ask the players of MachosRealm to help us. Any suggestion are welcome. Our players are the voice of MachosRealm. Thank you once again.
FORUMS: [url=http://www.machosrealm.com]MachosRealm[/url]

item.title: MachosRealm -2 Servers-

item.description:
@Machosrealm718rsps wrote:

Dave is pro:

I logged in and pking was dead

Our main aspect is not pking but I put that in there to show that pking did work and combat was good. Rambo is a good pker to talk to. Thank you for logging on and checking us out though.

item.title: MachosRealm -2 Servers-
item.dc:creator: @Machosrealm718rsps Machosrealm718rsps
item.description:
@Machosrealm718rsps wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

FORUMS: MachosRealm

Welcome to MachosRealm. We currently have 2 servers. A 317 server and a 718 server. The 317 is older graphics while the 718 has the newer graphics. We did this to allow players how they like to see their items.

Both servers offer an amazing experience. Our development team updates the servers as needed so unique content is added every week. Our forums, MachosRealm is well liked by our players. Chat on here and give and gain information that you need to have a great time on Machosrealm. Our staff team is mature, educated, and online all the time to give help to anyone that needs it. Our top of the line VPS gives us 100% NO LAG with both of our servers for hard development. Some of our player’s computers may experience some issues at first but once you adjust your settings, you are good to go.

Have fun and thanks for checking out Machosrealm

317:
-Unique source, has not been released anywhere.
-Many bosses to gain powerful items!
-We have dungeoneering with points
-We have 100% fullscreen!
-We have an amazing skilling system.
-We offer many minigames for our players to enjoy.
-Much more! Login to find out what we have to offer!

718:
-Unreal graphics. You’ll be blown away!
-Fullscreen for amazing view of our server.
-Many bosses to fight alongside your friends!
-Dungeoneering for those insane weapons!
-Construction to make cash!
-Custom home that has never been seen before!
-Amazing content for an enjoyable experience.
-Terrific skilling for all those lvl3 skillers
-The newest items to show off to your buddies!

[CENTER]

[/CENTER]

Thank you for taking the time to look at our server. We offer an enjoyable experience for any age. We take care of our players and go to the fullest extent to make them happy. We try our hardest to learn more in the programming world to increase the success of our server. We are constantly trying to get better and we ask the players of MachosRealm to help us. Any suggestion are welcome. Our players are the voice of MachosRealm. Thank you once again.

FORUMS: MachosRealm
